title: DIdn't get a chest on fiora?
body: I own fiora and i never got a chest on her before. Recently i just got an s and despite me never getting a chest before, i didn't get a chest.

replies.body:
Be sure to check your profile for how many total chests you have available right now. Keep in mind you can only have up to 4 slots at any one time, and they unlock once per week. After checking your recent history, it looks like this might be the case. Shoot me a quick screenshot of your profile showing you have a slot open and I can see what I can do.

https://i.gyazo.com/e40d8016ef43e10e98e7447eb0ca3689.png
